description: Situated on the road leading to Lugano in Switzerland, this charming restaurant with elegant furnishings and a rustic decor boasts bright dining rooms and a pleasant terrace for summer dining. The dishes are prepared with a focus on locally sourced, seasonal ingredients and are inspired by traditional recipes reinterpreted in contemporary style.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
